name: Brattleboro Memorial Hospital
notes: Independent nonprofit community hospital serving southeastern Vermont; founded 1904; serves ~55,000 people across 22 towns in VT, NH, and MA.

name: The Valley Hospital
notes: Independent nonprofit community hospital operated by Valley Health System; moved to new $868M facility in Paramus in 2024; named among America's 100 Best Hospitals by Healthgrades.

name: Sturdy Memorial Hospital
notes: Independent nonprofit community hospital in southeastern Massachusetts; rebranded as Sturdy Health; operates 26 primary and specialty care offices; founded 1913.
